description: Get information on predefined SSL policies.

commands.name: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined list
commands.summary: List all SSL predefined policies for configuring SSL policy.
commands.syntax: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined list
examples: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined list

commands.name: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined show
commands.summary: Get SSL predefined policy with the specified policy name.
commands.syntax: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined show --name
examples: az network application-gateway ssl-policy predefined show -n AppGwSslPolicy20170401
